item.title: 阿联酋称特朗普对伊朗加征关税“肯定会产生影响”
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国表示，美国对与伊朗有业务往来的国家征收25%关税将影响其商品供应，包括食品供应，但华盛顿如何实施该关税的具体细节尚不明确。【原文：The United Arab Emirates said the US imposing a 25% tariff on countries doing business with Iran will impact its commodity supplies, including food, yet details remain unclear on how Washington would apply the fee.】

item.title: 荷兰法院权衡芯片制造商恩智浦收购案下一步行动
item.description: 围绕芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司（Nexperia BV）的纠纷将进入关键阶段，荷兰法院正就是否应启动调查并剥夺中国控股方旺达科技（Wingtech Technology Co.）的控制权进行审议，该案涉及不当技术转让的指控。【原文：A dispute over chipmaker Nexperia BV will reach a critical stage as a Dutch court considers whether it should open an investigation and withhold control from Chinese owner Wingtech Technology Co. over allegations of improper technology transfers.】

item.title: 上田暗示加息路径不变，选举讨论升温
item.description: 日本央行行长植田和男在首相高市早苗可能于下月举行全国大选的猜测浮现并加剧后首次公开表态，暗示仍计划在条件允许时加息。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda signaled he still intends to lift interest rates when conditions allow, in his first public remarks after speculation emerged and intensified over the likelihood of Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi holding a national election next month.】

item.title: 香港出生率急剧下降或加剧人口压力
item.description: 香港正努力遏制出生人数的下降趋势，与此同时，该市人口正迅速老龄化。【原文：Hong Kong is struggling to stem the decline in the number of births at a time when the city’s population is rapidly aging.】

item.title: 瑞典曾经领先的绿色雄心正在瓦解
item.description:
排放量再度攀升，企业陷入财务困境

【原文：

Emissions are rising again, and companies are in financial trouble

】

item.title: 波兰料暂停降息 政策抉择趋紧：决策指南
item.description: 据分析师称，在通胀数据再度意外走低后，波兰央行可能暂停其降息周期，这一决定或将十分艰难。【原文：Poland’s central bank is poised to pause its series of interest-rate cuts, according to analysts, in what could be a close decision following another surprisingly low inflation readout.】

item.title: 中国将融资融券保证金比例上调至100%以控制风险
item.description: 中国已将证券交易所融资买入证券的最低保证金比例上调至100%，这是政策制定者为控制风险所采取的最新举措。【原文：China has raised the minimum margin requirement for financing securities purchases on its stock exchanges to 100%, the latest effort by policymakers to curb risks.】

item.title: 鲁比奥与印度外长通电话，贸易谈判陷入僵局
item.description: 美国国务卿马可·卢比奥周二与印度外长就贸易问题进行会谈，两国何时签署协议以缓解华盛顿对新德里的惩罚性关税问题仍悬而未决。【原文：US Secretary of State Marco Rubio spoke about trade with his Indian counterpart on Tuesday as questions linger over when the two countries will sign a deal to ease Washington’s punitive tariffs on New Delhi.】

item.title: 尽管全球抵制，中国钢铁出口仍创历史新高
item.description: 中国钢铁出口量在12月飙升至历史最高水平，为这一创纪录之年画上句号。尽管面临日益加剧的贸易压力和增速放缓的预期，海外出货量仍逆势上扬。【原文：China’s steel exports surged to an all-time high in December, rounding off a record year in which overseas shipments defied mounting trade pressures and expectations of a slowdown.】

item.title: 中国智普发布基于华为芯片训练的新人工智能模型
item.description: 中国人工智能初创企业知识图谱科技有限公司发布了一款新型多模态模型，宣称这是国内首个完全采用国产芯片训练完成的模型，标志着中国在实现减少对美国技术依赖的目标方面取得进展。【原文：Chinese AI startup Knowledge Atlas Technology JSC Ltd. released a new multimodal model that it says is the country’s first to be fully trained using domestic chips, in a sign of progress toward meeting Beijing’s goal of reducing reliance on American technology.】

item.title: 通胀数据看起来好得令人难以置信
item.description:
新年伊始便迎来意外惊喜，但市场并未因此欢欣鼓舞。【原文：

The year starts with a positive surprise, but markets refrain from glee.

】

item.title: 日本五年期国债需求低于12个月平均水平
item.description: 日本周三举行的五年期政府债券拍卖中，需求表现低于过去12个月的平均水平，因不断加剧的政治风险抑制了投资者的购买意愿。【原文：Japan’s five-year government bond auction Wednesday saw demand that was weaker than the 12-month average as growing political risks weighed on investor appetite.】

item.title: 印尼顶级草药企业Sido Muncul考虑出售股权
item.description: 印尼最大草药公司Sido Muncul的拥有者正在考虑包括出售股权在内的多种方案。【原文：The owner of Sido Muncul, Indonesia’s biggest herbal medicine company, is considering options including a stake sale.】

item.title: 韩元逼近17年低点，考验韩国干预决心
item.description: 韩元持续走弱，逼近全球金融危机以来的最低点，随着本土投资者将资金转移至海外，当局面临的捍卫本币汇率压力日益加剧。【原文：The South Korean won extended its decline toward its weakest level since the global financial crisis, intensifying pressure on authorities to defend the currency as local investors shift funds overseas.】

item.title: 可可豆价格下跌，但巧克力制造商仍持观望态度
item.description: 全球可可加工业持续承压，凸显出巧克力行业在一年前创纪录价格之后，需求持续萎缩的困境与艰难处境。【原文：Cocoa processing remains under pressure around the world, highlighting continued demand destruction and struggles for the chocolate industry in the wake of record prices a year ago.】

item.title: 中国煤炭进口量创年度最大降幅，大豆进口量攀升
item.description: 去年中国煤炭进口量出现十年来最大降幅，在主要大宗商品进口中跌幅最为显著。这主要是由于廉价替代品供应充足，以及火力发电量出现罕见萎缩。【原文：China’s coal purchases fell the most in a decade last year, posting the steepest drop among imports of major commodities due to an abundance of cheaper alternatives and a rare contraction in thermal power generation.】

item.title: 印度中小盘股重获青睐，大型同行增长乏力
item.description: 派博·塞里卡的阿巴伊·阿加瓦尔已增加中小盘股的配置比例【原文：Piper Serica’s Abhay Agarwal has raised small- and mid-cap exposure】

item.title: 中国2025年贸易顺差达1.2万亿美元，出口激增
item.description: 2025年中国贸易顺差攀升至1.2万亿美元，延续了创纪录的增长态势，年末海外出口意外实现强劲增长。【原文：China’s trade surplus climbed to $1.2 trillion in 2025, extending a record run as overseas shipments surprised with stronger growth at the end of the year.】

item.title: 东洋工程公司因日本寻求稀土而遭遇股价暴跌
item.description: 东洋工程公司空头面临的压力日益增大，因市场猜测中日紧张关系升级将迫使日本寻求稀土替代来源，该公司股价延续了去年的涨势。【原文：Pressure is mounting on short sellers of Toyo Engineering Corp. as the stock extends last year’s surge amid speculation that rising tensions with China will push Japan to seek alternative sources of rare earths.】

item.title: 印尼央行入市干预，卢比汇率逼近历史最低点
item.description: 印尼央行表示，由于持续的财政担忧导致印尼盾汇率逼近历史低点，该行正对外汇市场进行干预。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank said it is intervening in the foreign-exchange markets as the rupiah moves closer to a historic low on persistent fiscal concerns】

item.title: 阿瑞斯领衔私募信贷机构为Veritas交易提供增额贷款
item.description: 由Ares Management Corp.牵头的私募信贷机构集团，通过一项强有力的条款扩大了对某医疗软件平台的贷款规模——该条款确保在公司易主期间，现有债务得以维持不变。该平台正被Veritas Capital收购。【原文：A group of private credit lenders led by Ares Management Corp. upsized their loan to a health-care software platform being acquired by Veritas Capital, leveraging a powerful clause that ensures the firm’s existing debt stays in place while the company changes hands.】

item.title: 受大宗金属全面上涨推动，锡价在伦敦金属交易所创下51,000美元以上纪录高位
item.description: 伦敦锡价飙升至每吨51,000美元以上的新高，延续了长达三年的牛市行情。中国投资者的疯狂买盘推高了金属市场价格。【原文：Tin rallied to a new high above $51,000 a ton in London, extending a three-year bull run as frenzied buying by Chinese investors drove metals markets higher.】

item.title: 欧瑞森、法国兴业银行押注日元反弹，干预风险潜伏
item.description: 据欧瑞森SLJ资本和法国兴业银行称，日元近日持续下跌已加剧干预风险及大幅修正的可能性。【原文：The yen’s relentless slide in recent days has increased the risks of intervention and a sharp correction, according to Eurizon SLJ Capital and Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 暗黑舰队寻求俄罗斯庇护，因美国扣押油轮
item.description: 在美国开始扣押参与委内瑞拉石油贸易的船只后，这支在全球运输非法石油的黑暗油轮舰队正争相寻求俄罗斯国旗的庇护。【原文：The dark fleet of tankers shipping illicit oil around the world is rushing to seek the perceived protection of the Russian flag after the US started seizing vessels involved in the Venezuelan trade.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将数十亿美元电子游戏股票转移至子公司
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金正将其持有的价值约120亿美元的游戏公司股份——包括任天堂公司和万代南梦宫控股公司等企业——转移至其子公司Savvy Games Group。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund is transferring roughly $12 billion worth of gaming company shares, including firms such as Nintendo Co. and Bandai Namco Holdings Inc. to its subsidiary Savvy Games Group.】

item.title: 日本五年期国债收益率因选举风险升至2000年以来最高水平
item.description: 日本五年期国债收益率攀升至2000年该期限债券发行以来的最高水平，因首相高市早苗据称计划提前举行大选，加剧了市场对财政状况的担忧。【原文：Japan’s five-year government bond yield climbed to its highest since the tenor’s debut in 2000, as fiscal concerns deepened on Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s reported plans for a snap election.】

item.title: 特斯拉与美国平等就业机会委员会计划就加州工厂种族歧视诉讼展开和解谈判
item.description: 特斯拉公司将就美国平等就业机会委员会2023年提起的诉讼展开和解谈判。该机构指控这家电动汽车制造商在加州工厂存在基于种族的骚扰行为。【原文：Tesla Inc. will enter into settlement negotiations with the US Equal Employment Opportunity Commission over the agency’s 2023 lawsuit accusing the electric-vehicle maker of race-based harassment at its California factory.】

item.title: 初步数据显示英国经济在预算案后复苏乏力
item.description: 初步迹象表明，在财政大臣瑞秋·里夫斯公布预算案后的数周内，英国经济复苏势头乏力。劳动力市场持续恶化，成为阻碍2026年初经济回升前景的最大威胁。【原文：Early indicators suggest the UK economy struggled to bounce back in the weeks after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget, with a deepening labor market downturn the biggest threat to hopes for a pickup in early 2026.】

item.title: Cerebras正就以220亿美元估值融资进行磋商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能芯片供应商Cerebras Systems公司正筹备新一轮融资，拟筹集约10亿美元资金，此举将助力该公司与英伟达公司展开竞争。【原文：AI chip provider Cerebras Systems Inc. is in talks to raise roughly $1 billion in a new funding round, according to a person familiar with the matter, bolstering the company’s efforts to compete with Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 金价徘徊于历史高位附近，美国通胀数据为降息提供支撑
item.description: 金价在历史高位附近持稳，因美国通胀数据弱于预期，为进一步降息提供了依据，而地缘政治紧张局势依然高企。【原文：Gold was steady near a record high as weaker-than expected US inflation data supported the case for more rate cuts, while geopolitical tensions remained elevated.】
